Please visit This class implements an adaptor around the @B_org#apache#http#params#HttpParams_E@ interface to simplify manipulation of the HTTP protocol specific parameters. Note that the @B_org#apache#http#params#CoreProtocolPNames_E@ is for compatibility with existing application code only. References to the parameter names should use the interface, not this class.
